Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a simple device that uses a string and cups (or similar items) to communicate sound over a distance.
The student can show that the device allows two people to communicate by running a string between them.
The student can include in the drawing how sound travels from one cup to the other through the string.
The student can identify and label key parts of the device, such as the cups and string.
The student can explain through the drawing that the sound travels along the string when one student speaks and the other listens.
The student can illustrate how this simple device solves the problem of communicating over a distance using sound.
The student can show the device as an example of how technology helps people communicate and makes life easier.
